DOC.brief_summary: This single-arm , open-label , non-randomized study evaluate effect danoprevir/ritonavir pharmacokinetics escitalopram S-demethylcitalopram healthy volunteer . Healthy volunteer receive oral dos danoprevir/ritonavir escitalopram . The anticipated time study 6 week .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Effect Danoprevir/Ritonavir Pharmacokinetics Escitalopram S-Demethylcitalopram Healthy Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Adult healthy volunteer , age 18 55 year , inclusive Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.0 32.0 kg , inclusive Absence evidence active chronic disease Nonsmokers Presence active chronic disease Abnormal blood pressure Abnormal rest heart rate Abnormal ECG value History clinically significant cardiovascular cerebrovascular disease
